CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Align Panel to the Bottom
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Shifts the panel to the bottom of the screen to match the Homescreen

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Remove Carrier Label
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Removes carrier label at the bottom of lockscreen

EditTextPreference.android:title: Set Custom Carrier Text
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Sets custom text for carrier label (empty for default)

EditTextPreference.android:title: Set Custom Hint Text
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Sets custom text for hint label above the panel (empty for default)

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Disable Hide Shortcuts
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Disables the default hiding of shortcuts when swiping to unlock screen

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Disable Horizontal Arrows
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Disables the left and right arrows when swiping to unlock screen
